mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALBUM WHERE CLASS_NO IN (SELECT CLASS_NO FROM KINDER_CLASS K JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_NO = K.KINDER_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = #{userNo})

SELECT A.ALBUM_NO,A.ALBUM_TITLE,A.ALBUM_DATE,A.CLASS_NO,T.CHANGE_NAME FROM ALBUM A JOIN ATTACHMENT T ON A.ALBUM_NO = T.ALBUM_NO WHERE A.CLASS_NO IN (SELECT CLASS_NO FROM KINDER_CLASS K JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_NO = K.KINDER_NO WHERE U.USER_NO = 1) AND T.FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND A.STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT A.ALBUM_NO,A.ALBUM_TITLE,A.ALBUM_DATE,A.CLASS_NO,T.CHANGE_NAME FROM ALBUM A JOIN ATTACHMENT T ON A.ALBUM_NO = T.ALBUM_NO WHERE A.WRITER = #{userNo} AND T.FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND A.STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY 1 DESC
